term.title: radiation spectrum

item.text: The components of radiation arranged in order of their wavelengths, frequencies or quantum energies. For particle radiation they are arranged in order of their kinetic energies.

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1549 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
